content:
Day 1:
Morning:

* Arrive in Dar es Salaam, Tanzania
* Check in at the Slipway Hotel (rated 4.2/5 on Google Reviews) - located near the ocean with excellent views, and a variety of restaurants and bars

Afternoon:

* 12:30 pm: Lunch at The Waterfront Sunset Restaurant & Beach Bar (rated 4.3/5) - offers a great seafood selection and a beautiful view of the ocean
* 2:00 pm: Visit the National Museum (rated 4.1/5) - provides a glimpse into Tanzania's rich history and culture

Evening:

* 7:00 pm: Dinner at Chops N Hops (rated 4.4/5) - a fusion of local and international cuisine
* 9:00 pm: Enjoy cocktails and live music at Samaki Samaki (rated 4.2/5) - a trendy bar that offers a variety of cocktails and hosts live performances

Day 2:
Morning:

* 10:00 am: Brunch at Epi d'Or (rated 4.4/5) - a popular bakery and cafe with an extensive menu

Afternoon:

* 12:00 pm: Visit Village Museum (rated 4.2/5
